title: Gifting IP
body: Tbh I think that Riot should add gifting IP to friends or a person that has played a very supportive person. (a.k.a a person who did very well on the team.)  These are my opinions, and my thoughts. Maybe LoL could become more enjoyful of this suggestion. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} _

replies.body:
Suggestions are better suited for the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), as Help & Support is a channel where Porocles and I address technical issues or questions about League.

Let me know if you have any questions.
